name: HMS R.O.S
description:
ESCAPE THE MAZE. AVOID THE TRAPS.

TIME IS SHORT.....

Can you escape the HMS R.O.S? Will you fall foul of its treacherous traps?

Once a ship full of life, now it lies desolate with only death in its halls. Navigate the wreckage and find the door to the deck, this will be your only way out.
Don't get lost or you'll never leave.

WAIT is that a racoon!?

Everything apart from the sound was created by us! We hope you enjoy the maze.
This game was created for the UOC Game Jam 2021.
